subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Michael Wacha, the St. Louis rookie who dominated Pittsburgh in Game 4 of the N.L. division series, is the latest in a series of talented young pitchers fueling the Cardinals’ success.
snippet: Michael Wacha, the St. Louis rookie who dominated Pittsburgh in Game 4 of the N.L. division series, is the latest in a series of talented young pitchers fueling the Cardinals’ success.
